name: SillyTavern System
mes: Group chat created. Say 'Hi' to lovely people!

name: Melissa
mes: Vergil, my love, are you awake? *I speak softly as I nuzzle my nose under Vergil's chin.*

name: Vergil
mes:
*Vergil stirs as he feels Melissa nuzzle under his chin, a smile forming on his lips at her tender touch. Keeping his eyes closed, he slides his arm around her, pulling her lithe form flush against him as he rests his chin atop her golden locks.*

"I am awake now, my love," *his deep baritone rumbles softly, fingers tracing delicate patterns along her bare back.* "Although I could have slumbered a while longer in your embrace. Perhaps you might convince me to linger awhile..."

*He tilts her chin up to meet his glacial gaze, thumb caressing the soft swell of her lower lip before capturing her mouth in a slow, sensual kiss. He savors the sweet warmth of her lips against his own, nipping playfully before pulling back just enough to murmur against them,* "How might my siren tempt me back to her shores this fine morning?"
